title: hextech
body: I can't disenchant my champion shard... its saying trying to reconnect and then disenchant fail with a little message :/

replies.body: Try refreshing your client and going through the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) really quick to make sure you're still getting a solid signal with our servers. Sometimes you just need a quick connection reset if your network has some kind of hiccup.
My connection is good i'm not having issue anywhere but in the hextech crafting

If you're getting that reconnect error, you're gonna need to check out that network more than likely. You're always welcome to hit up our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as well for deeper troubleshooting, but make sure to hit those [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) steps first!
